State of Kentucky
Washington County } sct

This Affiant David Lawrence on his oath states that Henry Galispy otherwise Gallaspie -- who is the indicted under the an^n^exed indictment is now a private in Company G 144th Regiment of Indiana Volunteers infantry now in the service of the united states government. That said Gallaspy committed the offence charged in said indictment before he joined said Regiment and was at the time of the committing the same was a citizen of Washington County Kentucky and an avowed rebel sympathiser That after the committing said crime he fled from said County and joined the aforesaid Regiment. Affiant is the father of the murdered man. and has always been a loyal man.
Sworn to before me by David Lawrence this 4th May 1865

Commonwealth of
Kentucky
